nodes.name: Dataset Structured
nodes.description: This Node creates a DataFrame by reading data from HDFS, HIVE etc. The dataset was defined earlier in Fire by using the Dataset Feature. As a user, you just have to select the Dataset of your interest.

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable

fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: SELECT MAX(Drop_Count) AS Max_Drop_Count,MAX(Complete_Count) AS Max_Complete_Count,MAX(Call_Count) AS Max_Call_Count FROM fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT t1.Cell_Id, SUM(t2.Drop_Count) AS Sum_Drop_Count, SUM(t2.Complete_Count) AS Sum_Complete_Count, SUM(t2.Call_Count) AS Sum_Call_Count 

FROM tempTable1 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.Cell_Id = t2.Cell_Id GROUP BY t1.Cell_Id

nodes.name: Read CSV

fields.name: path

fields.title: Header
fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.name: mode
fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.title: Whether to Add Input File Name as Column in the Dataframe

fields.description: Decodes the CSV files by the given encoding type

fields.title: Quote
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

fields.name: escape
fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT t1.`Cell_Id`,
t1.`1stNearestCellID` AS 1st_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.`1stNearestDistance` AS 1st_Nearest_Distance, 
t1.`2ndNearestCellID` AS 2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.`2ndNearestDistance` AS 2nd_Nearest_Distance, 
t1.`3rdNearestCellID` AS 3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.`3rdNearestDistance` AS 3rd_Nearest_Distance,
t2.`1stNearestCellID` AS CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t2.`1stMax_Count` AS 1st_Max_Count, 
t2.`2ndNearestCellID` AS CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id, t2.`2ndMax_Count` AS 2nd_Max_Count, 
t2.`3rdNearestCellID` AS CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id, t2.`3rdMax_Count` AS 3rd_Max_Count

FROM tempTable1 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.Cell_Id = t2.Cell_Id

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
WITH Dist_1 AS (SELECT t1.Cell_Id,t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID,t1.1st_Nearest_Distance,t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.2nd_Nearest_Distance,t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID,
                t1.3rd_Nearest_Distance,t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t1.1st_Max_Count, t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id,t1.2nd_Max_Count,t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id,
                t1.3rd_Max_Count, t1.Unq_Cell_id, t2.Sum_Drop_Count AS 1st_dist_drop_count,t2.Sum_Call_Count AS 1st_dist_call_count

	FROM tempTable1 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID = t2.Cell_Id ),

Dist_2 AS (
	SELECT t1.Cell_Id,t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID,t1.1st_Nearest_Distance,t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.2nd_Nearest_Distance,t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID,
                t1.3rd_Nearest_Distance,t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t1.1st_Max_Count, t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id,t1.2nd_Max_Count,t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id,
                t1.3rd_Max_Count, t1.Unq_Cell_id, t1.1st_dist_drop_count,t1.1st_dist_call_count,  t2.Sum_Drop_Count AS 2nd_dist_drop_count,t2.Sum_Call_Count AS 2nd_dist_call_count

	FROM Dist_1 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID = t2.Cell_Id 
),

Dist_3 AS (
	SELECT t1.Cell_Id,t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID,t1.1st_Nearest_Distance,t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.2nd_Nearest_Distance,t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID,
                t1.3rd_Nearest_Distance,t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t1.1st_Max_Count, t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id,t1.2nd_Max_Count,t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id,
                t1.3rd_Max_Count, t1.Unq_Cell_id, t1.1st_dist_drop_count,t1.1st_dist_call_count,t1.2nd_dist_drop_count,t1.2nd_dist_call_count,
                t2.Sum_Drop_Count AS 3rd_dist_drop_count,t2.Sum_Call_Count AS 3rd_dist_call_count

	FROM Dist_2 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID = t2.Cell_Id 

),
CDR_1 AS (
	SELECT t1.Cell_Id,t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID,t1.1st_Nearest_Distance,t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.2nd_Nearest_Distance,t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID,
                t1.3rd_Nearest_Distance,t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t1.1st_Max_Count, t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id,t1.2nd_Max_Count,t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id,
                t1.3rd_Max_Count, t1.Unq_Cell_id, t1.1st_dist_drop_count,t1.1st_dist_call_count,t1.2nd_dist_drop_count,t1.2nd_dist_call_count,
                t1.3rd_dist_drop_count,t1.3rd_dist_call_count,t2.Sum_Drop_Count AS 1st_cdr_drop_count,t2.Sum_Call_Count AS 1st_cdr_call_count

	FROM Dist_3 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id = t2.Cell_Id 

),
CDR_2 AS (
	SELECT t1.Cell_Id,t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID,t1.1st_Nearest_Distance,t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.2nd_Nearest_Distance,t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID,
                t1.3rd_Nearest_Distance,t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t1.1st_Max_Count, t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id,t1.2nd_Max_Count,t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id,
                t1.3rd_Max_Count, t1.Unq_Cell_id, t1.1st_dist_drop_count,t1.1st_dist_call_count,t1.2nd_dist_drop_count,t1.2nd_dist_call_count,
                t1.3rd_dist_drop_count,t1.3rd_dist_call_count,t1.1st_cdr_drop_count,t1.1st_cdr_call_count,
                t2.Sum_Drop_Count AS 2nd_cdr_drop_count,t2.Sum_Call_Count AS 2nd_cdr_call_count

FROM CDR_1 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id = t2.Cell_Id 

)

SELECT t1.Cell_Id,t1.1st_Nearest_Cell_ID,t1.1st_Nearest_Distance,t1.2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID, t1.2nd_Nearest_Distance,t1.3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID,
                t1.3rd_Nearest_Distance,t1.CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id, t1.1st_Max_Count, t1.CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id,t1.2nd_Max_Count,t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id,
                t1.3rd_Max_Count, t1.Unq_Cell_id, t1.1st_dist_drop_count,t1.1st_dist_call_count,t1.2nd_dist_drop_count,t1.2nd_dist_call_count,
                t1.3rd_dist_drop_count,t1.3rd_dist_call_count,t1.1st_cdr_drop_count,t1.1st_cdr_call_count,
                t1.2nd_cdr_drop_count,t1.2nd_cdr_call_count,
                t2.Sum_Drop_Count AS 3rd_cdr_drop_count,t2.Sum_Call_Count AS 3rd_cdr_call_count, t2.Max_Drop_Count AS MXDC, t2.Max_Call_Count AS MXCC

FROM CDR_2 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id = t2.Cell_Id

nodes.name: PySpark
nodes.description: This node runs any given PySpark code. The input dataframe is passed into the function myfn as a parameter.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: code
fields.value:
'''
Input:
  spark: spark session 
  workflowContext:  workflowcontext object 
  id: node number 
  inDF: input pyspark dataframe 
  cust_dict: Dictionary of the workflow variables passed from previous node 
Output:
  outDF: return pyspark dataframe i.e outDF 
 ''' 
 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from pyspark.sql.functions import * 
from pyspark.sql import * 
from fire.workflowcontext import WorkflowContext 
import json
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import pprint



def final_Calculation(row):
    cellid = row["Cell_Id"]
    unq_cells = row["Unq_Cell_id"].split(';')
    
    nearest_1, nearest_2, nearest_3 = 0 if pd.isna(row["1st_Nearest_Cell_ID"]) else row["1st_Nearest_Cell_ID"], 0 if pd.isna(row["2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID"]) else row["2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID"], 0 if pd.isna(row["3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID"]) else row["3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID"] # x[0],x[1],x[2]
    
    cdr_nearest_1, cdr_nearest_2, cdr_nearest_3 = 0 if pd.isna(row["CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id"]) else row["CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id"], 0 if pd.isna(row["CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id"]) else row["CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id"], 0 if pd.isna(row["CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id"]) else row["CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id"] #y[0],y[1],y[2]
    drop_count_1, drop_count_2, drop_count_3 = row["1st_dist_drop_count"],row["2nd_dist_drop_count"],row["3rd_dist_drop_count"]
    call_count_1, call_count_2, call_count_3 = row["1st_dist_call_count"],row["2nd_dist_call_count"],row["3rd_dist_call_count"]
    cdr_drop_count_1, cdr_drop_count_2, cdr_drop_count_3 = row["1st_cdr_drop_count"],row["2nd_cdr_drop_count"],row["3rd_cdr_drop_count"]
   
    cdr_call_count_1, cdr_call_count_2, cdr_call_count_3 = row["1st_cdr_call_count"],row["2nd_cdr_call_count"],row["3rd_cdr_call_count"]
    max_drop_count = 1 if pd.isna(row["Max_Drop_Count"]) or row["Max_Drop_Count"] == 0  else row["Max_Drop_Count"]
    max_call_count = 1 if pd.isna(row["Max_Call_Count"]) or row["Max_Call_Count"] == 0 else row["Max_Call_Count"]
    
    
    y_dict = {}
    ## Coefficients Initialisation
    a1, a2, a3, a4 = 1, 2, -1, -1
    
    for adj_cell_id in unq_cells:
        adj_cell_id = int(adj_cell_id)
        # Set x1 according to the distance position
        x1 = 3.5 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_1) else 2.5 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_2) else 1.5 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_3) else 0
        
        # Set x2 according to the CDR position
        x2 = 3.5 if adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_1) else 2.5 if adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_2) else 1.5 if adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_3) else 0

        drop_count = drop_count_1 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_1) or adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_1) else drop_count_2 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_2) or adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_2) else drop_count_3 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_3) or adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_3) else 0
        call_count = call_count_1 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_1) or adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_1) else call_count_2 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_2) or adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_2) else call_count_3 if adj_cell_id == int(nearest_3) or adj_cell_id == int(cdr_nearest_3) else 0
        
        drop_count = 0 if drop_count is None else drop_count
        call_count = 0 if call_count is None else call_count
        
        x3 = (int(drop_count) / int(max_drop_count)) if drop_count > 0 else 0
        x4 = (int(call_count) / int(max_call_count)) if call_count > 0 else 0
        
        #count_details = getCount(adj_cell_id, df)
        
        
        # Calculate y for Each cell
        result = (a1 * x1) + (a2 * x2) + (a3 * x3) + (a4 * x4)
        #result1 = str(result)+" \n DC: "+str([drop_count_1, drop_count_2, drop_count_3])+" \n CC: "+str([call_count_1, call_count_2, call_count_3])+" \n CDC: "+str([cdr_drop_count_1, cdr_drop_count_2, cdr_drop_count_3])+" \n CCC: "+str([cdr_call_count_1, cdr_call_count_2, cdr_call_count_3])+" \n nearest: "+str([nearest_1, nearest_2, nearest_3])+" \n cdr_nearest: "+str([cdr_nearest_1, cdr_nearest_2, cdr_nearest_3])
        #result = "(a1 * "+str(dc)+") + (a2 * "+str(md)+") + (a3 * "+str(cc)+") + (a4 * "+str(mc)+")"
        y_dict[adj_cell_id] = result
        
    ## Sorting the dict acoording to the value of y    
    sorted_dict = dict(sorted(y_dict.items(), key=lambda item: item[1], reverse=True))
	
    return sorted_dict

  
  


def myfn(spark: SparkSession, workflowContext: WorkflowContext, id: int, inDF: DataFrame, cust_dict:dict):
    #outDF = inDF  #add custom logic
    inDF = inDF.toPandas()
    
    inDF["Final_Result"] = inDF.apply(final_Calculation, axis=1)
    inDF.sort_values("Cell_Id", inplace=True)
    inDF["Final_Result"] = inDF["Final_Result"].astype("str")
    
    schema = StructType([
        StructField("Cell_Id", StringType(), False),
        StructField("1st_Nearest_Cell_ID", StringType(), True),
        StructField("1st_Nearest_Distance", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_Nearest_Cell_ID", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_Nearest_Distance", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_Nearest_Cell_ID", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_Nearest_Distance", StringType(), True),
        StructField("CDR_1st_Nearest_Cell_Id", StringType(), True),
        StructField("1st_Max_Count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("CDR_2nd_Nearest_Cell_Id", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_Max_Count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("CDR_3rd_Nearest_Cell_Id", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_Max_Count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("Unq_Cell_id", StringType(), True),
        StructField("1st_dist_drop_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("1st_dist_call_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_dist_drop_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_dist_call_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_dist_drop_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_dist_call_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("1st_cdr_drop_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("1st_cdr_call_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_cdr_drop_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("2nd_cdr_call_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_cdr_drop_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("3rd_cdr_call_count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("MXDC", StringType(), True),
        StructField("MXCC", StringType(), True),
        StructField("Max_Drop_Count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("Max_Complete_Count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("Max_Call_Count", StringType(), True),
        StructField("Final_Result", StringType(), True)
    ])
    
    # Convert to PySpark DataFrame
    outDF = spark.createDataFrame(inDF, schema=schema)
    
    return outDF
